text: Live in Hollywood may refer to one of the following albums: *Live in Hollywood (Linda Ronstadt album), 2019 *Live in Hollywood (Warne Marsh album), 1979 *Live in Hollywood (RBD album), 2006 **Live in Hollywood (RBD video album), 2006 *Live in Hollywood (The Doors album), 2002 *CeCe Peniston (EP Live) by Peniston, in 2013 retitled as Live in Hollywood *Live in Hollywood by Marianne Faithfull
title: Live in Hollywood
